Reviews.Title: Mine was/is still faulty
Reviews.Author: FAK
Reviews.Content: I had to fight more months with wanscam commercial office and they haven't been able to solve the problem they had caused to me by selling a still beta product.

Reviews.Title: Just a big mistake, will be returning
Reviews.Author: Mesimo "messik"
Reviews.Content: The first thing I noticed when I downloaded the iphone app is that there were no arrows for controlling the motion of the camera. You can only sit and watch as it rotates around in scan mode, which was a major irritant. This camera is made for the Chinese market - the DDNS providers were all Chinese and I couldn't use my own provider. It took very long (20 seconds+) for camera to pick up commands from the iphone app - stop motion, LED light on/off, etc. The camera itself seems to be sturdy and well built but technology behind it leaves a lot to be desired. The motion is very slow even at the fastest setting. I will be returning this for sure.
